name.ingredients: 300g firm tofu (cubed), 300g spinach (palak), 1 onion (finely chopped), 2 tomatoes (pureed), 1 green chili (slit), 1 tsp ginger-garlic paste, 1 tsp cumin seeds, 1 tsp garam masala, ½ tsp turmeric powder, ½ tsp red chili powder, 2 tbsp oil, Salt to taste.
instructions: Blanch spinach in hot water for 2-3 minutes, then transfer to cold water. Blend into a smooth puree.
Heat oil in a pan, add cumin seeds, and let them splutter.
Add onions and sauté until golden brown.
Add ginger-garlic paste, green chili, and tomato puree. Cook until the oil separates.
Add turmeric, red chili powder, garam masala, and salt. Add spinach puree and cook for 5 minutes.
Add tofu cubes and simmer for another 5-7 minutes. Serve hot with roti or rice.
